title: Konnichiwa Anne
alternative_title: Konnichiwa Anne: Before Green Gables, こんにちは アン ～Before Green Gables
description: Anne Shirley goes through quite a lot of adventures before she ends up in Green Gables. She is living with a family and helps out by looking after the kids, helping in the chores around the home. Meanwhile she discovers more about who she is...
genre: [<Genre -> Drama>, <Genre -> Historical>, <Genre -> Kids>, <Genre -> Slice of Life>]
